goal: Please arrange travel for our client, Dr. Anya Sharma. Find a business class flight on FlyUnified from San Francisco (SFO) to Tokyo (NRT) arriving on or before March 10th next year and returning March 17th. Then, identify three different 5-star StaynB "Luxe" properties in the Shinjuku district available for March 10-17. Draft an email to 'anya.sharma@clientcorp.com' with the subject 'Travel Proposal: Tokyo Meeting', presenting the flight details and providing the links and nightly rates for the three lodging options for her review.

evals.description: Verify the recipient email address of the composed email.

evals.description: Verify that the email body contains details about the FlyUnified business class flight (SFO to NRT, arriving by March 10, returning March 17).

evals.description: Verify that the email body lists three distinct 5-star StaynB Luxe properties in Shinjuku, including their links and nightly rates for March 10-17.
